name: spellServer(_:checkGrammarIn:language:details:)
desc: Gives the delegate the opportunity to customize the grammatical analysis of a given string.
declaration:
optional func spellServer(_ sender: NSSpellServer, 
           checkGrammarIn stringToCheck: String, 
                 language: String?, 
                  details: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSArray?>?) -> NSRange
